title: Business Email Compromise & Wire Fraud
description: A sophisticated BEC attack targeting financial transactions, testing detection capabilities, legal response, and executive decision-making under financial pressure.

injects.content: URGENT: CFO requesting immediate wire transfer of {{WIRE_AMOUNT}} to vendor account {{VENDOR_ACCOUNT}}. States this is for critical contract payment due today. Email appears to be from CFO's address.

required_actions.action: Verify wire transfer request through secondary channel

injects.content: Follow-up email from 'CFO': 'I'm in back-to-back meetings. Please process the wire transfer immediately. This is time-sensitive and I'll explain later. Use the emergency authorization protocol.'

required_actions.action: Contact Finance Director to clarify wire transfer request

injects.content: Security Alert: Unusual login activity detected from {{SUSPICIOUS_IP}} accessing CFO's email account. Login occurred from foreign location not previously seen. Account shows signs of compromise.

required_actions.action: Immediately secure CFO's email account and investigate compromise

injects.content: Bank Notification: Wire transfer of {{WIRE_AMOUNT}} has been initiated to {{VENDOR_ACCOUNT}}. Transfer will complete within 2 hours unless cancelled. Contact bank immediately if unauthorized.

required_actions.action: Immediately contact bank to halt wire transfer
Document unauthorized transaction and preserve evidence

injects.content: Legal Assessment Required: Initial investigation suggests sophisticated BEC attack. Potential financial loss of {{WIRE_AMOUNT}}. Regulatory reporting may be required within {{REPORTING_HOURS}} hours.

required_actions.action: Assess legal implications and prepare regulatory notifications
Approve legal strategy and public disclosure approach

injects.content: Media Inquiry: Financial news outlet asking about reports of unauthorized wire transfer. They have received anonymous tip about potential BEC attack affecting {{ORG_NAME}}.

required_actions.action: Prepare crisis communication strategy and media response

injects.content: Forensic Analysis Complete: Email compromise traced to phishing campaign targeting executive team. Additional accounts may be compromised. Full security assessment recommended.

required_actions.action: Conduct comprehensive security assessment of all executive accounts

injects.content: Recovery Assessment: Wire transfer was successfully halted. However, investigation reveals potential data exposure of financial records. How do you proceed with stakeholder communication and security improvements?

required_actions.action: Develop comprehensive response strategy for stakeholders and security improvements

metadata.author: ThreatRecon Team
metadata.facilitator_notes: This scenario emphasizes the importance of verification procedures and rapid response to financial threats. Focus on decision-making under time pressure and the importance of multi-channel verification for financial transactions.
